text.name: sys_description
text.text: EasyRPG is a community project aimed at creating a free role-playing game creation tool compatible with "RPG Maker 2000/2003" games. Most are similar to the style of the great classics of the late 80s, early 90s, with beautiful 16-bit 2D pixel art graphics. The event system is very complete and allows total scriptwriting freedom, the combat system can either look like a "Final Fantasy" or be action type like a "Zelda". In terms of sound, the engine offers a variety of formats ranging from MIDI to CD quality formats.
